author: Gregory Opera

changelog.release_notes:
This watchface has been tested using Pebble firmware version 2.8.1, with no apparent issues - the watchface should work fine for all Pebble "smart" watches running Pebble firmware version 2.x or higher, however no guarantee of successful use can be given for users running Pebble "smart" watch firmware older than this...

This watchface was created with Paul Rode's Watchface Generator:
http://www.watchface-generator.de

Check out Paul's site, create and publish your own watchfaces - if you find his site valuable, I highly encourage you to donate via the applicable link on his Web site.

description:
A simple watchface based on the logo of MMGN, one of the Web's best entertainment communities.

From anime and manga, to gaming, music, pop culture, film and television, MMGN is one of the very best communities the Internet has to offer!

This MMGN watchface was purely created for developer testing purposes, but if your member of MMGN and wish to show your love for the site, why not take this for a spin?
